title: The Lady Luck
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and restaurant. Menu includes vegetarian dishes, some of which can be made vegan when requested. Cooking areas for veg meals are separate from meat area. Most dishes are made on the premises, including the vegan sausages, vegan chilli, vegan burger, and dairy-free bread rolls. The changing specials are sometimes vegan.
